body_html: Okay so it looks like we should remove the device keyword argument for torch.LongTensor because it never worked and we are not promoting the legacy tensor constructors. We should also check to see if the torch.tensor.new method takes a device argument

body: Okay so it looks like we should remove the device keyword argument for torch.LongTensor because it never worked and we are not promoting the legacy tensor constructors. We should also check to see if the torch.tensor.new method takes a device argument
